response.overview: You can't beat a bit of Old Skool Bonehaed action can you?- there’s something about those Doc Marten’s, tight as fuck jeans, t shirts, braces and No 1 buzz cut : it's the classic British hard man look and this Triga audition film is rammed with them – a dirty dozen Skin and Scally lads whopping out their hard cocks for the cameraman to prove they’ve got what it takes to be in the next Triga Bonehead fuckfest. Cocky, arrogant fuckers this bunch are, who can’t wait to show us what they’ve got and how much spunk they can shoot all over the studio. It’s a sight for sore eyes so get yer clippers out, get your boots on and cum join the gang.
response.title: Auditions: Skins and Scallies
